block.p: Because of a production error, an article cited in the News Summary yesterday about South Africa's Truth and Reconciliation Commission, which was conducting a hearing on the assassination of a top ally of Nelson Mandela, was omitted from some copies. Readers wishing copies of the article may write to Production Quality Control, The New York Times, 229 West 43d Street, New York, N.Y. 10036, or telephone (212) 556-1992. E-mail: quality@nytimes.com. (Include a postal return address.)
